== Demo App ==

The demo app shows off a great deal of the functionality of the calendar.  It's easy to get going.

You'll need the sqlite3-ruby gem:

{{{
sudo gem install sqlite3-ruby
}}}

To install and runn the demo

{{{
svn co http://calendardateselect.googlecode.com/svn/cds_demo
cd cds_demo
rake db:migrate
script/server
}}}
